amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to be used for the Batteries and Electric Drive Technology program within the Department of Energy's Efficiency and Renewable Energy Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used for the Batteries and Electric Drive Technology program within the Department of Energy's Efficiency and Renewable Energy Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A061) Failed by voice vote.
